featured.text: As a result, the astronauts have swollen, puffy faces, very much resembling that of the round-headed Charlie Brown in the famous comic strip.
When the paper-thin browned potatoes arrived, the diner was pleased.
These were thickly cut potatoes, fried until golden brown and crisp on the outside.

other.text: His dark brown jacket had holes in the elbows and had _____ to light brown, but he continued to wear it.
This “Charlie Brown effect” will be more 19 when the astronauts go on their Mars missions, which will take about three years to complete, much longer than missions to the moon.
Mr. Brown suggested that Mary stay with the company, ________, because the company needed her.

definition.zh_def: 棕色的，通常是由紅色和綠色混合而成的顏色。
definition.en_def: A color that is a dark shade of orange or a mix of red and green.
definition.example: The brown dog played happily in the park.
